text: Human Nature is the only science of man and yet has been hitherto the most neglected.
author: David Hume

text: Be truthful, nature only sides with truth.
author: Adolf Loos

text: The man who interprets Nature is always held in great honor.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

text: When I was growing up, Dr. Seuss was really my favorite. There was something about the lyrical nature and the simplicity of his work that really hit me.
author: Tim Burton

text: I did not want to be a tree, a flower or a wave. In a dancer's body, we as audience must see ourselves, not the imitated behavior of everyday actions, not the phenomenon of nature, not exotic creatures from another planet, but something of the miracle that is a human being.
author: Martha Graham
